description: Retrieves cost and usage metrics for your account.
mitreAttackTechniques: T1518.001 - Software Discovery: Security Software Discovery
T1071.001 - Application Layer Protocol: Web Protocols
T1530 - Data from Cloud Storage Object
T1567.002 - Exfiltration Over Web Service: Exfiltration to Cloud Storage

incidents.description: When a Zero Day and Access Keys Collide in the Cloud: Responding to the SugarCRM Zero-Day Vulnerability

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetCostAndUsage to determine how active an account is by understanding the cost within a cloud account.

simulation.value: aws ce get-cost-and-usage --time-period Start=2017-09-01,End=2017-10-01 --granularity MONTHLY --metrics 'BlendedCost' 'UnblendedCost' 'UsageQuantity' --group-by Type=DIMENSION,Key=SERVICE Type=TAG,Key=Environment
